item.title: Broccoli pizza crust
item.description: This recipe is similar to Cauliflower pizza crust. Preheat the oven: Set the oven to 220°C (425°F). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or lightly grease it with oil. Prepare the broccoli: Steam the chopped broccoli (including stems if using) until tender. Pulse it in a food processor until finely grated. Transfer the grated broccoli to a cheesecloth or clean kitchen towel and squeeze out as much water as possible to ensure a dry mixture.

item.title: Cauliflower pizza crust
item.description: This recipe is similar to Broccoli pizza crust. Preheat the oven: Set the oven to 220°C (425°F). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or lightly grease it with oil. Prepare the cauliflower: Pulse the cauliflower in a food processor until finely grated. Transfer the grated cauliflower to a cheesecloth or clean kitchen towel and squeeze out as much water as possible to ensure a dry mixture. Make the dough: In a bowl, mix the grated cauliflower, egg, 2 tbsp mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.

item.title: Pizza toast
item.description: Prepare the Bread: If you wish, lightly toast the slices of sandwich bread in a toaster or air fryer for 1-2 minutes. This will prevent them from getting too soggy with the toppings. Assemble the Toast-Pizza: On each slice of bread, spread a thin layer of tomato sauce. Add the Toppings: Place your favorite extra toppings over the tomato sauce. Cover with Cheese: Sprinkle a generous amount of grated mozzarella cheese over the toppings.

item.title: Super Mexican pizza
item.description: Preheat the oven: Preheat to 220°C (430°F) or follow the pizza dough package instructions. Place a pizza stone or baking sheet in the oven to heat up. Prepare the base: Roll out the pizza dough to your desired thickness and place it on a sheet of parchment paper for easy handling. Spread an even layer of tomato sauce over the dough. Add toppings: Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella cheese evenly over the base.
